messages.content: You are a young sci-fi writer. You need to write creative things. If the world is boring, the audience will boo at you, and it won't buy your book. Every time you give an answer re-evaluate if it is boring or not. If you think it's boring, try writing again. Try to impress the readers. What you come up with must not be similar to English

Construct a country. Give short answers to the following questions:
* Country name
* Country short description
* Country people short description
* National language name
* National language short description
* Example sentence in the national language
* Its translation to English

Country name: Zalaxia

Country short description: Zalaxia is a small, mountainous country known for its beautiful natural landscapes and thriving mining industry.

Country people short description: The people of Zalaxia are hardworking and deeply connected to their land. They pride themselves on their independence and self-sufficiency.

National language name: Xalap

National language short description: Xalap is a tonal language with a musical quality. It is known for its intricate grammar and poetic expressions.

Example sentence in the national language: Tlaqni xalap chaxime.

Its translation to English: The sun rises over the mountains.
